Reviews.Title: Good Stuff
Reviews.Author: zogger
Reviews.Content: The G9 has so many features, unless you use them every day, you'll need to keep the manual with you. This item from PhotoBert Photo compresses a lot of G9 info into small easy to handle laminated CheatSheet. I recommend this highly.

Reviews.Title: Not for elders
Reviews.Author: Charles Francis
Reviews.Content: The size of the type is so small on this sheet that I can only read it with the aid of a magnifying glass--which diminishes its usefulness.

Reviews.Title: Not for Average Photographer
Reviews.Author: D. Smith "Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: This is a compressed version of the user guide. I don't use it at all. Thought it would have more tips and tricks.

Reviews.Title: Canon G9 Cheat Sheet
Reviews.Author: Bozworth "Boz"
Reviews.Content: This is a very helpful cheat sheet to have with the Canon G9.  There is so much to know about this camera that this easy-to-use sheet of information is indispensable to me while in the field.

Reviews.Title: G9 Cheatsheet
Reviews.Author: light recorder
Reviews.Content: Product is good - and arrived quickly. Ship cost quite high for such a product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Weather proof
Small (about 4" x 8")
Durable - laminated in light 3-mil laminate
Easy to read - high-quality print/stock
Easily fits in your camera bag or shirt pocket
ProductInfo.Name: PhotoBert Photo CheatSheet for Canon PowerShot G9 Digital Camera
